titles.title: Secure Rural Schools and Community Self-Determination Reauthorization Act of 2007
A bill to reauthorize the Secure Rural Schools and Community Self-Determination Act of 2000.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2718)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S3194-3195)

bill.summary:
3/6/2007--Introduced.
Secure Rural Schools and Community Self-Determination Reauthorization Act of 2007 - Amends the Secure Rural Schools and Community Self-Determination Act of 2000 to extend the Act through FY2007.
